name: Tugay's Basics in lucky and world
name_original: Tugay's Basics in lucky and world
description: Tugay's Basics is a modded Baldi's Basics with almost all textures changed.  Characters: Principal of The Thing is now MARIO player PL, Playtime, Gotta Sweep is now Betty Troya (poster says "Gotta Sweep"), Baldi is now Tugay BENDY, Arts and Crafters is now Tomas (me), 1st Prize, It's a Bully is now This is Evil Four. Cheats Mod built in. I hope you enjoy my mod! :D
